text:
Care/of | NYC | Full-Time | ONSITE

Care/of is a health and wellness brand based in New York City. We provide honest guidance to help you personalize a pack of vitamins & supplements that's right for you, and send them to you in convenient daily packs. We produce our own line of supplements from the best quality ingredients, sourced from around the globe.

The company was founded in 2016 and closed its most recent round of funding in August 2017 with a $13.9M Series A lead by Goodwater Capital.

Crunchbase: https://www.crunchbase.com/organization/care-of

Open Roles:
